attributes.review: This app has DISGUSTING statements regarding the LGBTQIA+ community along with people of color! A blatant disregard for the law of “Hate speech” because that’s all that’s on this app! I care across multiple accusations towards our community and continuing to support this app on the Apple store makes me think twice about the company and the state of our country.
